title: The most lamentable Romaine tragedie of Titus Andronicus As it was plaide by the right honourable the Earle of Darbie, Earl of Pembrooke, and Earl of Sussex their seruants.
author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter, and are to be sold by Edward White & Thomas Millington, at the little North doore of Paules at the signe of the Gunne,
notes: Some print slightly faded and some pages stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
